creator: ONESOFT
descriptionHtml:
“Red Code! I repeat it's Red Code! The Zombie War, it's happening! We're being attacked by a huge zombie wave. Zombie Defender Hero team, get on the turret NOW!”

In 2113, the zombie apocalypse has thrown humanity into the most horrible disaster, a tremendous Zombie War, which turned human beings into bloodthirsty zombies. By fighting against endless waves of zombie attack, you, along with a hero squad, are the light in those darkest days. Your mission? Keeping the civilization safe by building the last shelter as strong as possible, boosting heavy weapons, and assembling a legendary hero team.

In Zombie War - Idle Defense Game, the rush of the creeps has never been so cruel, these battles will leave you unforgettable impressions. There’re several maps full-filling with varieties of zombie. Each level contains several waves of the walking deads with a very high pace, which challenges your training and strategic skills. To be the greatest defender hero in this defender battle, your mission is to defeat these brutal zombies in order to prevent the zombie infection. Don't forget to build a strong team such as zombie army, zombie slayer, zombie seige, zombie strike, zombie defender hero... whatever make you the most resilient squad to win this strategic idle defense shooting TD game. Having the thoughtful gameplay, this game is the perfect combination of the genres TD, AFK, PVZ, IDLE, DEFENSE, SHOOTING game.
Will you survive till the very end of the zombie war? Join our free idle defense game to find out!

⚡️FEATURE⚡️
- Idle Defense battle: Choose your machine gun and sidekicks heroes to defend brutal zombies.
- Challenging mission everyday: Complete mission, collect coins, diamonds to boost equipment and defender hero team.
- Many heavy weapons, add-on grenades and heroes with a lot of unique skills.
- Several maps and varieties of zombie to unlock.
- Lucky spin, daily quest and free gems everyday for you.

🕹 HOW TO PLAY 🕹
- Idle defending with auto mode, tap the zombie to change the shooting direction or control it manually by turning auto mode off.
- Drag the add-on grenades to the enemy zone to slay them.
- Upgrade weapons, heroes, and your turret to build a stronger team.
- Complete mission to collect more coins and gems.

Survive to the very end of tremendous zombie war and give hope to build a new world! 🌏

By fighting against endless waves of zombie attack, you, along with a hero squad, are the light in those darkest days. Your mission? Keeping the civilization safe by building the last shelter as strong as possible, boosting heavy weapons, and assembling a legendary hero team.

In Zombie War - Idle Defense Game, the rush of the creeps has never been so cruel, these battles will leave you unforgettable impressions. There’re several maps full-filling with varieties of zombie. Each level contains several waves of the walking deads with a very high pace, which challenges your training and strategic skills. To be the greatest defender hero in this defender battle, your mission is to defeat these brutal zombies in order to prevent the zombie infection. Don't forget to build a strong team such as zombie army, zombie slayer, zombie seige, zombie strike, zombie defender hero... whatever make you the most resilient squad to win this strategic idle defense shooting TD game. Having the thoughtful gameplay, this game is the perfect combination of the genres TD, AFK, PVZ, IDLE, DEFENSE, SHOOTING game.
Will you survive till the very end of the zombie war? Join our free idle defense game to find out!

⚡️FEATURE⚡️
- Idle Defense battle: Choose your machine gun and sidekicks heroes to defend brutal zombies.
- Challenging mission everyday: Complete mission, collect coins, diamonds to boost equipment and defender hero team.
- Many heavy weapons, add-on grenades and heroes with a lot of unique skills.
- Several maps and varieties of zombie to unlock.
- Lucky spin, daily quest and free gems everyday for you.

🕹 HOW TO PLAY 🕹
- Idle defending with auto mode, tap the zombie to change the shooting direction or control it manually by turning auto mode off.
- Drag the add-on grenades to the enemy zone to slay them.
- Upgrade weapons, heroes, and your turret to build a stronger team.
- Complete mission to collect more coins and gems.

Survive to the very end of tremendous zombie war and give hope to build a new world! 🌏

In 2113, the zombie infection has brought a annihilated zombie tsunami and thrown humanity into the most horrible disaster, a tremendous War, which turned human beings into bloodthirsty monsters. Our peaceful world is in danger and about to become a horrendous zombieland. By fighting against endless waves of zombie attack, you, along with a hero squad, are the light in those darkest days. Your mission? Keeping the civilization safe by building the last shelter as strong as possible, boosting heavy weapons, and assembling a legendary zombiesmash hero team.

In Zombie War - Idle Defense Game, the rush of the creeps has never been so cruel, these battles will leave you unforgettable impressions. There’re several maps full-filling with varieties of zombieville, and bosses. Each level contains several waves of the walking deads with a very high pace, which challenges your training and strategic skills. To be the greatest defender hero in this defender battle, your mission is to defeat these brutal enemies in order to prevent the infection. Don't forget to build a strong team to make you the most resilient squad to win this strategic idle defense shooting TD game. Having the thoughtful gameplay with zombie defense theme, this game is the perfect combination of the genres td, idle, defense, shooting game. Also, with the classic arcade games spirit, a modern context of tower defense games, and the casual games genre, this is the right choice specially designed for adventurous seekers.
Will you survive till the very end of the zombie war? Join our free game to find out!

⚡️FEATURE⚡️
- Idle Defense battle: Choose your machine gun and sidekicks heroes to defend brutal zombies.
- Challenging mission everyday: Complete mission, collect coins, diamonds to boost equipment and defender hero team.
- Many heavy weapons, add-on grenades and heroes with a lot of unique skills.
- Several maps and varieties of zombie to unlock.
- Lucky spin, daily quest and free gems everyday for you.

🕹HOW TO PLAY 🕹
- Idle defending with auto mode, tap the zombie to change the shooting direction or control it manually by turning idle auto mode off.
- Drag the add-on grenades to the enemy zone to slay them.
- Upgrade weapons, heroes, and your turret to build a stronger team.
- Complete mission to collect more coins and gems.

Survive to the very end of the tremendous war and give hope to build a new world, Zombie Hero! 🌏

Find us on Facebook and join our Community to get support quickly:
https://www.facebook.com/Zombie-War-Idle-Defense-Game-102727741615799

In 2113, the zombie infection has brought a annihilated zombie tsunami and thrown humanity into the most horrible disaster, a tremendous War, which turned human beings into bloodthirsty monsters. Our peaceful world is in danger and about to become a horrendous zombieland. By fighting against endless waves of zombie attack, you, along with a hero squad, are the light in those darkest days. Your mission? Keeping the civilization safe by building the last shelter as strong as possible, boosting heavy weapons, and assembling a legendary zombiesmash hero team.

In Zombie War - Idle Defense Game, the rush of the creeps has never been so cruel, these battles will leave you unforgettable impressions. There’re several maps full-filling with varieties of zombieville, and bosses. Each level contains several waves of the walking deads with a very high pace, which challenges your training and strategic skills. To be the greatest defender hero in this defender battle, your mission is to defeat these brutal enemies in order to prevent the infection. Don't forget to build a strong team to make you the most resilient squad to win this strategic idle defense shooting TD game. Having the thoughtful gameplay with zombie defense theme, this game is the perfect combination of the genres td, idle, defense, shooting game. Will you survive till the very end of the zombie war? Join our free game to find out!

⚡️FEATURE⚡️
- Idle Defense battle: Choose your machine gun and sidekicks heroes to defend brutal zombies.

- Several maps and varieties of zombie to unlock.
- Lucky spin, daily quest and free gems everyday for you.

- Idle defending with auto mode, tap the zombie to change the shooting direction or control it manually by turning idle auto mode off.

- Complete mission to collect more coins and gems.

In 2113, the zombie infection has brought a annihilated zombie tsunami and thrown humanity into the most horrible disaster, a tremendous War, which turned human beings into bloodthirsty monsters. Our peaceful world is in danger and about to become a horrendous zombieland. By fighting against endless waves of zombie attack, you, along with a hero squad, are the light in those darkest days. Your mission? Keeping the civilization safe by building the last shelter as strong as possible, boosting heavy weapons, and assembling a legendary zombiesmash hero team.

In Zombie War - Idle Defense Game, the rush of the creeps has never been so cruel, these battles will leave you unforgettable impressions. There’re several maps full-filling with varieties of zombieville, and bosses. Each level contains several waves of the walking deads with a very high pace, which challenges your training and strategic skills. To be the greatest defender hero in this defender battle, your mission is to defeat these brutal enemies in order to prevent the infection. Don't forget to build a strong team to make you the most resilient squad to win this strategic idle defense shooting TD game. Having the thoughtful gameplay with zombie defense theme, this game is the perfect combination of the genres td, idle, defense, shooting game. Also, with the classic arcade games spirit, a modern context of tower defense games, and the casual games genre, this is the right choice specially designed for adventurous seekers.
Will you survive till the very end of the zombie war? Join our free game to find out!

⚡️FEATURE⚡️
- Idle Defense battle: Choose your machine gun and sidekicks heroes to defend brutal zombies.
- Challenging mission everyday: Complete mission, collect coins, diamonds to boost equipment and defender hero team.
- Many heavy weapons, add-on grenades and heroes with a lot of unique skills.
- Several maps and varieties of zombie to unlock.
- Lucky spin, daily quest and free gems everyday for you.

🕹HOW TO PLAY 🕹
- Idle defending with auto mode, tap the zombie to change the shooting direction or control it manually by turning idle auto mode off.
- Drag the add-on grenades to the enemy zone to slay them.
- Upgrade weapons, heroes, and your turret to build a stronger team.
- Complete mission to collect more coins and gems.

Survive to the very end of the tremendous war and give hope to build a new world, Zombie Hero! 🌏

Find us on Facebook and join our Community to get support quickly:
https://www.facebook.com/Zombie-War-Idle-Defense-Game-102727741615799

In 2113, the zombie infection has brought a annihilated zombie tsunami and thrown humanity into the most horrible disaster, a tremendous War, which turned human beings into bloodthirsty monsters. Our peaceful world is in danger and about to become a horrendous zombieland. By fighting against endless waves of zombie attack, you, along with a hero squad, are the light in those darkest days. Your mission? Keeping the civilization safe by building the last shelter as strong as possible, boosting heavy weapons, and assembling a legendary zombiesmash hero team.

In Zombie War - Idle Defense Game, the rush of the creeps has never been so cruel, these battles will leave you unforgettable impressions. There’re several maps full-filling with varieties of zombieville, and bosses. Each level contains several waves of the walking deads with a very high pace, which challenges your training and strategic skills. To be the greatest defender hero in this defender battle, your mission is to defeat these brutal enemies in order to prevent the infection. Don't forget to build a strong team to make you the most resilient squad to win this strategic idle defense shooting TD game. Having the thoughtful gameplay with zombie defense theme, this game is the perfect combination of the genres td, idle, defense, shooting game. Also, with the classic arcade games spirit, a modern context of tower defense games, and the casual games genre, this is the right choice specially designed for adventurous seekers.
Will you survive till the very end of the zombie war? Join our free game to find out!

⚡️FEATURE⚡️
- Idle Defense battle: Choose your machine gun and sidekicks heroes to defend brutal zombies.
- Challenging mission everyday: Complete mission, collect coins, diamonds to boost equipment and defender hero team.
- Many heavy weapons, add-on grenades and heroes with a lot of unique skills.
- Several maps and varieties of zombie to unlock.
- Lucky spin, daily quest and free gems everyday for you.

🕹HOW TO PLAY 🕹
- Idle defending with auto mode, tap the zombie to change the shooting direction or control it manually by turning idle auto mode off.
- Drag the add-on grenades to the enemy zone to slay them.
- Upgrade weapons, heroes, and your turret to build a stronger team.
- Complete mission to collect more coins and gems.

Survive to the very end of the tremendous war and give hope to build a new world, Zombie Hero! 🌏

Find us on Facebook and join our Community to get support quickly:
https://www.facebook.com/Zombie-War-Idle-Defense-Game-102727741615799

- Drag the add-on grenades to the enemy zone to slay them.
- Upgrade weapons, heroes, and your turret to build a stronger team.
- Complete mission to collect more coins and gems.

Survive to the very end of the tremendous war and give hope to build a new world, Zombie Hero! 🌏

descriptionHtml:
“Red Code! I repeat it's a Red Code! The Zombie War, it's happening! We're being attacked by a huge wave. Defender Hero team, get on the turret NOW!”

In 2113, the zombie infection has brought a annihilated zombie tsunami and thrown humanity into the most horrible disaster, a tremendous War, which turned human beings into bloodthirsty monsters. Our peaceful world is in danger and about to become a horrendous zombieland. By fighting against endless waves of zombie attack, you, along with a hero squad, are the light in those darkest days. Your mission? Keeping the civilization safe by building the last shelter as strong as possible, boosting heavy weapons, and assembling a legendary zombiesmash hero team.

In Zombie War - Idle Defense Game, the rush of the creeps has never been so cruel, these battles will leave you unforgettable impressions. There’re several maps full-filling with varieties of zombieville, and bosses. Each level contains several waves of the walking deads with a very high pace, which challenges your training and strategic skills. To be the greatest defender hero in this defender battle, your mission is to defeat these brutal enemies in order to prevent the infection. Don't forget to build a strong team to make you the most resilient squad to win this strategic idle defense shooting TD game. Having the thoughtful gameplay with zombie defense theme, this game is the perfect combination of the genres td, idle, defense, shooting game. Also, with the classic arcade games spirit, a modern context of tower defense games, and the casual games genre, this is the right choice specially designed for adventurous seekers.
Will you survive till the very end of the zombie war? Join our free game to find out!

⚡️FEATURE⚡️
- Idle Defense battle: Choose your machine gun and sidekicks heroes to defend brutal zombies.
- Challenging mission everyday: Complete mission, collect coins, diamonds to boost equipment and defender hero team.
- Many heavy weapons, add-on grenades and heroes with a lot of unique skills.
- Several maps and varieties of zombie to unlock.
- Lucky spin, daily quest and free gems everyday for you.

🕹HOW TO PLAY 🕹
- Idle defending with auto mode, tap the zombie to change the shooting direction or control it manually by turning idle auto mode off.
- Drag the add-on grenades to the enemy zone to slay them.
- Upgrade weapons, heroes, and your turret to build a stronger team.
- Complete mission to collect more coins and gems.

Survive to the very end of the tremendous war and give hope to build a new world, Zombie Hero! 🌏
